block.p: Alternate-side parking regulations in New York City will be suspended tomorrow in observance of Lincoln's Birthday. Other regulations remain in effect. All government offices will be open, but most courts will be closed. No trash or recyclables will be collected, but trash may be placed outside after 5 p.m. In New Jersey and Connecticut, courts and state offices will be closed.
